entries.desc: Clears the screen.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color to clear the screen with. See Color Palette for more information.

entries.desc: Draws a pixel at the specified coordinates.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the pixel.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the pixel.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the pixel. See Color Palette for more information.

entries.desc: Gets/Sets the clipping rectangle. If no arguments are given, the clipping rectangle is returned. If the width or the height is 0, clipping is disabled.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the clipping rectangle.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the clipping rectangle.

args.name: w
args.desc: The width of the clipping rectangle.

args.name: h
args.desc: The height of the clipping rectangle.

entries.desc: Gets/Sets the transparency color. If no arguments are given, the transparency color is returned. If the color is greater than 32, it's set to the default value (255/disabled).

args.name: color
args.desc: The color to set the transparency to. See Color Palette for more information.

entries.desc: Draws a line between two points.

args.name: x1
args.desc: The x coordinate of the first point.

args.name: y1
args.desc: The y coordinate of the first point.

args.name: x2
args.desc: The x coordinate of the second point.

args.name: y2
args.desc: The y coordinate of the second point.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the line. See Color Palette for more information.

entries.desc: Draws a rectangle.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the rectangle.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the rectangle.

args.name: w
args.desc: The width of the rectangle.

args.name: h
args.desc: The height of the rectangle.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the rectangle. See Color Palette for more information.

args.name: fill
args.desc: If true, the rectangle will be filled with the specified color. If false, the rectangle will be drawn with the specified color.

entries.desc: Draws a circle.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the center of the circle.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the center of the circle.

args.name: r
args.desc: The radius of the circle.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the circle. See Color Palette for more information.

args.name: fill
args.desc: If true, the circle will be filled with the specified color. If false, the circle will be drawn with the specified color.

entries.desc: Draws a sprite.

args.name: id
args.desc: The ID of the sprite to draw.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the sprite.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the sprite.

args.name: hflip
args.desc: If true, the sprite will be horizontally flipped.

args.name: vflip
args.desc: If true, the sprite will be vertically flipped.

entries.desc: Gets/Sets the camera position. If no arguments are given, the camera position is returned.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the camera.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the camera.

entries.desc: Gets the pixel value from the sprite sheet at the specified position.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the pixel.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the pixel.

entries.desc: Sets the pixel value in the sprite sheet at the specified position.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coordinate of the pixel.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coordinate of the pixel.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the pixel. See Color Palette for more information.

entries.desc: Checks if a button was pressed.

args.name: button
args.desc: The button to check. See Button List for more information.

entries.desc: Checks if a button was released.

args.name: button
args.desc: The button to check. See Button List for more information.

entries.desc: Checks if a button was held.

args.name: button
args.desc: The button to check. See Button List for more information.

entries.desc: Gets the cursor position.
Quits the game.
Linear interpolation.

args.name: a
args.desc: From

args.name: b
args.desc: To

args.name: t
args.desc: Factor

entries.desc: Value clamping.

args.name: v
args.desc: Initial value

args.name: min
args.desc: Minimum

args.name: max
args.desc: Maximum

entries.title: Button List
entries.desc: Button constant strings.

list.left: Left button. Mapped to Left Arrow Key, S Key and Numpad 4.

list.right: Right button. Mapped to Right Arrow Key, F Key and Numpad 6.

list.up: Up button. Mapped to Up Arrow Key, E Key and Numpad 8.

list.down: Down button. Mapped to Down Arrow Key, D Key and Numpad 2.

list.a: A button. Mapped to J Key, Z Key and Left Mouse Button.

list.b: B button. Mapped to K Key, X Key and Right Mouse Button.

list.jump: Left button. Mapped to Space Key and Numpad 5.

list.start: Left button. Mapped to Enter Key and Numpad Enter.

entries.title: Color Palette
entries.desc: Available color list.
